sk.tsystems.forum.services

Class TaskServices

  • java.lang.Object
    • sk.tsystems.forum.services.TaskServices

  • public class TaskServices
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains methods needed for adding, removing and retrieving information about stored data of Task class from the database.
    Author:
    martinharcarik

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TaskServices() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addTaskToDatabase(Task task)
      Adds the instance of Task class into database.
      Task getTask(int taskID)
      Gets the instance of the Task class from the database identified by the value of the property 'taskID'.
      java.util.List<Task> printTasks(int topicID)
      Gets the list of all instances of Task class stored in the database for the specified instance of the Topic class.
      void removeTask(int taskID)
      Removes the instance of the Task class with specified property 'taskID' from database
      void updateTask(int taskID, java.lang.String newTaskName, java.lang.String newTask)
      Sets the properties 'taskName' and 'task' of the specified instance of the Task class and stores this instance into the database.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • TaskServices

        public TaskServices()

    • Method Detail

      • addTaskToDatabase

        public void addTaskToDatabase(Task task)
        Adds the instance of Task class into database. Instance of Task is sent as a parameter.
        Parameters:
        task - is the instance of class Task that needs to be stored in database.

      • removeTask

        public void removeTask(int taskID)
        Removes the instance of the Task class with specified property 'taskID' from database
        Parameters:
        taskID - is value of 'taskID' property of the Task class. Needed to retrieve the specified instance of the Task class.

      • printTasks

        public java.util.List<Task> printTasks(int topicID)
        Gets the list of all instances of Task class stored in the database for the specified instance of the Topic class.
        Parameters:
        topicID - value of 'topicID' property of Topic class needed to identify the instance of the Topic class to get the list of instances of Task class for
        Returns:
        list of all instances of the Task class from database for specified instance of Topic class

      • getTask

        public Task getTask(int taskID)
        Gets the instance of the Task class from the database identified by the value of the property 'taskID'.
        Parameters:
        taskID - is value of 'taskID' property of the Task class
        Returns:
        the instance of Task class with specified value of it's property 'taskID' or null, if the specified instance is not present in the database

      • updateTask

        public void updateTask(int taskID,
                       java.lang.String newTaskName,
                       java.lang.String newTask)
        Sets the properties 'taskName' and 'task' of the specified instance of the Task class and stores this instance into the database.
        Parameters:
        taskID - value of the property 'taskID' stored in the database, used to retrieve the instance of the Task class from the database before updating it's properties
        newTaskName - new value of the property 'taskName' of the Task class to be stored in the database
        newTask - new value of the property 'task' of the Task class to be stored in the database
